# 🚀 `src-nextgen/` Rebuild Tracker

This folder tracks the UI rebuild from scratch, with complete role, theme, and patch daemon enforcement.

---

## 📋 Purpose
- Tracks every major step in the refactor
- Updated automatically on every patch or change
- Translates technical operations into plain English

---

## 🧩 Scaffold Initial Folders

Create fresh structure for next-gen app views:
- `views/`
- `components/`
- `layouts/`
- `hooks/`
- `theme/`
- `tokens/`
- `helpers/`

Each will contain a `.nextgenpatch` marker.

---

## 🔁 Patch System Integration
- Patch runner (`patch_runner_main.py`) treats `src-nextgen/` as a **primary target zone**
- Patch summaries write to:
  - `/Users/sawyer/gitSync/tm-mobile-cursor/mobile-native-fresh/tasks/patches/`
  - `/Users/sawyer/gitSync/tm-mobile-cursor/mobile-native-fresh/tasks/summaries/`
- Daemon auto-sorts `.stop`, `.tests/`, `.ready` folders

---

## 📂 Legacy Backup
- Legacy `src/` moved to `/Users/sawyer/gitSync/tm-mobile-cursor/mobile-native-fresh/src-reference/`
- Used for:
  - Visual diffing
  - Sacred component cherry-picks
  - Lint baseline preservation

---

## 🛫 AUTOPILOT FLIGHT PLAN — PHASES

| Phase | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| 1     | 📦 Scaffold `src-nextgen/`, create starter pages and docs |
| 2     | 🔐 Inject sacred page clones from `src-reference/` |
| 3     | 🎨 Rebuild `theme/`, `tokens/`, components, and wrappers |
| 4     | 🔁 Rewire `App.tsx` and entrypoint to new routes |
| 5     | 🧪 Inject test views for click/nav/overlay regressions |
| 6     | 🔍 Run screenshot baseline visual regression |
| 7     | 📘 Final review, docs, and freeze commit/tag |

---

## 🔁 FAIL-SAFE PROTECTIONS

- ✅ `.nextgenpatch` markers prevent rogue patches
- ✅ `.json.stop` halts autopilot instantly
- ✅ `.md` required for any verified commit/tag
- ✅ `.cursor-config.json` watches recursively, ignores clock skew
- ✅ `.gitignore` protected freeze lockfiles enforced
- 🛑 Original `src/` is **read-only**. Will never be overwritten.

---

## 📘 Companion Docs
- `ROADMAP_FOR_DUMMIES.md`: Auto-updating human-readable changelog
- `INDEX.md`: Tracks patch phase status, links to summaries
- Patch IDs follow format: `patch-1.4.1e-*-*_desc.json`

---

**Maintained by GPT autopilot. Do not modify manually unless instructed.**
